definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bow down (NH id.; J Aram. [[שְׁחִי]] (rare); akin to [[שׁוח]], [[שׁחח]]);—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יַשְׁחֶָנׇּה]] Pr 12:25, fig., anxiety depresses it (sc. [[לֵב]]; opp. [[שִׂמֵּחַ]]).

definitions.title: Hithpa‘lēl
definitions.body: :170 (Ges:§ 75 kk) Pf. 3 ms. [[הִשְׁתַּחֲוׇה]] Ez Eze 46:2; 2 ms. [[הִשְׁתַּחֲוִ֫יתָ]] De 4:19 + 3 t.; 1 S. [[הִשְׁתַּחֲוֵ֫יתִי]] 1Sa 16:4 + 2 t.; 3 mpl. [[הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ]] Je 8:2, etc.; Impf. [[יִשְׁתַּחֲוֶה]] 2Sa 15:32 + 3 t.; apoc. [[יִשְׁתַּ֫חוּ]] Is 44:17 +; 3 mpl. [[יִשְׁתַּחֲווּ]] Ge 49:8 +; 2 fpl. [[תִּשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֫יןָ]] Ge 33:6, Ge 37:7, etc.; Imv. fs. [[הִשְׁתַּחֲוִי]] Ps 45:12; mpl. [[הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ]] Ps 29:2 +; Inf. cstr. [[הִשְׁשַׁתַּחֲוֹת]] Ge 37:10 +; sf. [[מִשְׁתַּחֲוֶי]] 2Ki 5:18 (but LXX Vulgate and mod. [[חֲוֹתוֹ]]-); Pt. [[מִשְׁתַּחֲוֶה]] 2Ki 19:27, etc.; [[מִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶּם]] Ez Eze 8:16, read [[וִים]]- all mod.;—
bow down, prostrate oneself, before a monarch or superior, in homage, etc.:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: c. [[לְ]], after descriptive phr.: [[קדד ארחה]] Ex 34:8 (J); [[ארחה]] om. Ge 24:26, Ge 24:48 (J) + 4 t.; [[כרע אפים ארחה]] 2Ch 7:3; [[כרע]] 2Ch 29:29; [[נפל ארחה]] Job 1:20; [[נפל לפני]] 2Ch 20:18.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: c. [[לְ]] only: 1Sa 1:28 (but read [[וַתַּנִּחֵהוּ]] LXX and mod.), 1Sa 15:25, Je 7:2, Ps 66:4 + 9 t.; c. [[לפני]] De 26:10, Is 66:23 + 4 t.; c. [[בְ]] loc. Is 27:13; c. [[לְ]] loc. Ps 99:9; abs. Ge 22:5 (E) Ju Jdg 7:15 + 5 t.; acc. loc. Ex 33:10 (E) Je 26:2, Ez Eze 46:3; [[מזבח]]([[ה]])[[לפני ]] Is 36:7 = 2Ki 18:22 = 2Ch 32:12; c. [[על]] loc. Ge 47:31 (J) 1Ki 1:47, Ez Eze 46:2; [[מֵרֶחׂק]] after off Ex 24:1 (E).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: before angel in theoph.: after cl. c. [[נפל]], [[קדד]], Jos 5:14, Nu 22:31; sq. [[אפים ארחה]] Ge 19:1; [[ארחה]] Ge 18:2 (all J).
